kizuna_home_c_02:
There is something that I would...very much like
to ask for your help with.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_c_03:
Well, you see, I do not want anyone to overhear
this, but...[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_c_04:
I hear rumors of an incredibly sweet condiment
that exists somewhere in the Paldea region.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_c_05:
I absolutely must experience that ambrosial
sweetness for myself.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_c_06:
You are the only one who knows of my insatiable
sweet tooth. Thus, I have no one else I can turn\r
to for help in this matter.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_c_07:
I cannot go looking for this condiment myself lest
I destroy the image students have of me.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_c_08:
I will repay you for your troubles, of course.
Give it some thought if this piques your interest.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_c_09:
In the meantime, I will gather what information I
can about this incredibly sweet condiment.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_c_10:
I will share what I find with you as soon as I have
more detailed information.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_c_11: You feel trusted by Mr. Saguaro!
